Content.Text:
<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You want to see some clothing? What's
Yuri doing, then...?
<PAGE>
Ah, she's so engrossed in her work she
hasn't noticed a customer! Come with me.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, Yuri? You've got a customer!

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
"What" isn't the half of it! You need to
pay a little more attention to your
surroundings while you're working!
<PAGE>
You've got a customer!
<MYNAME> is here.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Oh, you silly girl!
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>I'm sorry, <MYNAME>. She doesn't mean
anything by it. It's her first time
running a shop.
That's no way to treat customers

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, thank you. Hey, Yuri.
You thank him too!

<FACE_YURI><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
It was... fun to talk to you. Please...
please come again.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I'm really sorry. I always tell Yuri to
try harder. Please, Yuri, apologize.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, I'll do my best to instruct
her in how to interact with customers.
Could you just leave, for today?
